thread.section_title: Hotel de Suez - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Hotel de Suez, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Erik G
title: Perfect location
text: Although the rooms are a bit tight and the walls a bit thin, the location of this hotel makes up for everything. Public transport buses stop right in front of the entrance door and the metro stops are a few minutes walk. You can visit the Notre Dame, the Pantheon, Luxembourg Gardens by up to 10 minutes walk. Getting here from Gare de l'Est and Gare du Nord is extremely easy with bus line 38 or Metro line no.4.
